item.title: 17 Nov 2023 21:30
item.description: A short work trip to Managua. As a kid, I always wanted to visit the beaches in Nicaragua. Not quite sure, why? Well, here I am! We did plan to go visit the Masaya volcano but couldn’t quite go because apparently it was kinda active and they didn’t want us inhaling sulphur fumes. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: A short work trip to Managua. As a kid, I always wanted to visit the beaches in Nicaragua. Not quite sure, why? Well, here I am! We did plan to go visit the Masaya volcano but couldn’t quite go because apparently it was kinda active and they didn’t want us inhaling sulphur fumes. ðŸ”—
